definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: The security guard of the apartment did not enter the Visa Office of the South Korean Embassy.
sentences.chinese: 公寓保安人員沒有進入韓國駐華使館領事部。

sentences.english: Our consular officers are required to give the reason in writing.
sentences.chinese: 我們的領事官必須書面說明拒籤原因。

sentences.english: You'll report to me here. Butthe Consulate Security Man must not know that I am in Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 但是領事館的治安官不能知道我在伊斯坦布爾。

sentences.english: Counselor Yao Wenliang and Consul Li Zhuang from the Chinese Consulate General were present.
sentences.chinese: 使館參贊堯文良和領事李壯等在座。

sentences.english: The president tried to sweep the embarassing incident under the rug.
sentences.chinese: 總統試圖隱瞞領事館事件。

sentences.english: Yasuhisa Kawamura is Japan's deputy consul general in New York.
sentences.chinese: 川村泰久是日本駐紐約副總領事。

sentences.english: Has that North Korean citizen enter the Visa Office of the South Korean Embassy?
sentences.chinese: 那名朝鮮人是否已進入韓國使館領事部？

sentences.english: What stuck most in Chinese craws was that resident British ambassador.
sentences.chinese: 最刺痛中國人神經的是允許英國領事常駐北京。

sentences.english: For more details please contact your nearest Brunei Embassy or diplomatic representative.
sentences.chinese: 請向您附近的汶萊大使館或領事館查詢最新詳情。

sentences.english: Consular officers can request that this form be filled out by other applicants as well.
sentences.chinese: 領事官可要求其他申請人也填寫此表格。

sentences.english: Entry into the United States would require consular invoice in quadruplicate.
sentences.chinese: 在美國辦理報關手續需要四份領事發票。

sentences.english: What is the phone-number of the consulate?
sentences.chinese: 領事館的電話號碼是多少？

sentences.english: Pinkerton and the Consul knock at the door and enter.
sentences.chinese: 平克頓和領事敲門進來。

sentences.english: Britain once set up its consulate in Tengchong in 1899.
sentences.chinese: 英國曾於1899年在騰衝設立領事館。

sentences.english: Counsellor Yao Wenliang and Consul Li Zhuang from the Chinese Consulate General were present.
sentences.chinese: 使館參贊堯文良和領事李壯等陪同。

sentences.english: As soon as the formalities had been got over, the consulate was quick to issue the work permit.
sentences.chinese: 正式手續一辦完，領事館就很快簽發了工作許可證。

definition: head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
pay an official call/call on/visit in an official capacity
to make a speech/to make some remarks
